room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Escape the Room Milwaukee in Milwaukee
review: We had a blast playing the apartment. The room was fun, difficult, but not impossible. Our guide was kind and informative. We had a group that new each other pretty well so we were able to split up and tackle multiple puzzles at a time. We had 8 in our group, it felt like having more than that may have gotten a little crowded, but we needed about 8 to get the puzzles solved in time.

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Escape the Room Milwaukee in Milwaukee
review: We had a great time in our escape room- we did The Apartment. It was very challenging and fun and enough areas and puzzles for each person to participate. The only thing I would change was that we were in a room with other people we didn't know.

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Escape the Room Milwaukee in Milwaukee
review: I did the Apartment escape. There were 4 of us and worked great!! I would definitely recommend people doing this. They gave just enough info to help. We finished in 52 mins. Can't wait to try the others!
